content: HDI Long version (replacement stop bits) Setting tools for long HDI anchors ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Drill holes precisely to the desired depth No need to change tools – drilling and setting can be done with the same tool Up to 50% faster than the traditional method (overhead hammering) – increasing productivity Large rubber grip for easier handling Drilling and setting with one tool Applications Installation of Hilti HDI drop-in anchors for fastening pipes, air ducts and suspended ceilings Installation of HDI drop-in anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Base material: Reinforced concrete, Concrete Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Base material | Reinforced concrete, Concrete | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | Multi Cutter | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2419225 - HDI-TZ 3/8 Replacement Stop Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-TZ 3/8 Stop drill bit assy
